description: When should you use Scenario Outline vs individual Scenarios?
question: Should this test case use Scenario Outline or individual Scenarios?

options.name: Individual Scenarios
options.description: Write separate scenarios when each case has distinct business meaning, different setup, or unique behavior that should be clearly documented.
options.when_to_use: Cases represent different business rules, distinct Given contexts, or warrant separate documentation
example: Scenario: Apply standard discount for loyalty members
Scenario: Apply premium discount for VIP members

options.name: Scenario Outline with Examples
options.description: Use Scenario Outline when testing the same behavior with different data values. The logic is identical, only the inputs/outputs vary.
options.when_to_use: Same behavior, different data values, testing boundaries, parameterized validation
example: Scenario Outline: Calculate shipping based on weight
